attributes.action: Stop wasting NHS money on advertising
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time of cutbacks in the hospital building programme due to lack of funds, The NHS should not be allowed to spend taxpayers money on advertising stopping smoking , and healthier living, these are matters for the individual to decide, and the adverts do very little good, as statistics show, spend it on more nurses and cleaner hospitals where it will do some good.
